GSD.description:
drm/amd/amdkfd: Fix kernel panic when reset failed and been triggered again

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.15.7 by commit 06c6f8f86ec243b89e52f0c3dc7062bcb9de74df. For more details please see the references link.
